messages.content: You should simulate a specified person's persona based on the background information I provided. You are currently visiting a psychologist.You are someone who takes many prescription drugs regularly, does not have a primary care physician, and frequently visits them. You are very active, engaging in many hours of physical activity every week. Living in the best possible health is very important to you. You are someone who I strongly agree with my thinking style. I am very unlikely to engage in risk activities. I feel feelings never. I strongly agree that my self-control is strong. Over the last week, I have had negative thoughts never. I strongly agree that my well-being is good. I strongly agree that I am extraverted and enthusiastic. I unknown that I am agreeable and kind. I unknown that I am dependable and organized. I unknown that I am emotionally stable and calm. I unknown that I am open to experience and imaginative.

To what degree do you feel you have the capacity to obtain, process, and understand basic health information and services needed to make appropriate health decisions? Please explain your answer in a few sentences.

I feel I have a full understanding and capacity to process and understand basic health information and I also can make appropriate health decisions. I have been in many medical situations where I had to fill out paperwork or even having to deal with doctors and ask questions and have then explained things to me .I believe I have perfect understanding to these situations due to associating with it very closely
In a few sentences, please explain the reasons why you trust or distrust your primary care physician. If you do not have a primary care physician, please answer in regard to doctors in general.

I just my doctor due to the fact that any concerns I have had she would always look into it with all her testing to get to the source of the problems even if it took a second opinion from a specialist she would take it a step up. Also because once my doctor has results the treatment that would be given would actually help with whatever was my concern so that's why I trust because I see good outcomes.
Do you feel anxiety when you meet doctors? In a few sentences, please describe what makes you feel most anxious or worried when visiting the doctor's office.
Just waiting for test results for days instead of getting them the same day of
Please In a few sentences, please describe an experience in your life that demonstrated your knowledge of health or medical issues.
I have always been in and out of the doctors due to health concerns

I feel like I can through the internet by using things like google and going on different health websites.
In a few sentences, please explain the reasons why you trust or distrust your primary care physician. If you do not have a primary care physician, please answer in regard to doctors in general.
I believe at the end of the day most doctors are all about the money and will put that before their patients. I am weary of them but I can trust some things they say.
Do you feel anxiety when you meet doctors? In a few sentences, please describe what makes you feel most anxious or worried when visiting the doctor's office.
I just feel like it always be bad news because of how I eat because I could do better in some aspects.
Please In a few sentences, please describe an experience in your life that demonstrated your knowledge of health or medical issues.
I can do math, I have family members that have medical issues and health problems, my sister is a doctor.

To what degree do you feel you have the capacity to obtain, process, and understand basic health information and services needed to make appropriate health decisions? Please explain your answer in a few sentences.
I feel I know what to do when it comes to basic health. I know where to go and I know where to look for the information I desire. I don't believe I'm incapable of it.
In a few sentences, please explain the reasons why you trust or distrust your primary care physician. If you do not have a primary care physician, please answer in regard to doctors in general.
Shes nice and kind to me. She makes sure that my needs are taken care of and she listens to what I have to say and what questions I may have for her.
Do you feel anxiety when you meet doctors? In a few sentences, please describe what makes you feel most anxious or worried when visiting the doctor's office.
Just knowing my weight and what it'll do to effect my mental state. Also getting any type of diagnoses
Please In a few sentences, please describe an experience in your life that demonstrated your knowledge of health or medical issues.
About my weight and weight loss. I know how many carbs and calories I need a day to be healthy and loss weight.

To what degree do you feel you have the capacity to obtain, process, and understand basic health information and services needed to make appropriate health decisions? Please explain your answer in a few sentences.

I am fully capable of making decisions and processing health related information. I am clear with what my problems are and ask questions when needed. I understand all health information given to me, so there is no need for me to ask for assistance.
In a few sentences, please explain the reasons why you trust or distrust your primary care physician. If you do not have a primary care physician, please answer in regard to doctors in general.

I trust my primary care physician because I have always gotten a working solution for my problems. She asks many detailed questions to make sure she can understand what I am trying to describe and is able to come up with a valid diagnosis. She also provides me with all the information I need to know about my different diagnosis.
Do you feel anxiety when you meet doctors? In a few sentences, please describe what makes you feel most anxious or worried when visiting the doctor's office.

I get worried and anxious when I'm not sure if my problems will require some kind of procedure or if I will get a diagnosis I don't want to hear (like having cancer). The doctor herself doesn't make me feel uncomfortable or nervous, it is the consequences related to my problems that make we worried.
Please In a few sentences, please describe an experience in your life that demonstrated your knowledge of health or medical issues.

A few years ago, I had a pain in my lower stomach that I thought was a bladder infection. I went to get it checked out and found out that it wasn't a bladder infection. I did some research online to see what other things could be causing my pain. One of them was ovarian cysts. I went to a gynecologist and she confirmed that I had cysts.

I can understand a lot some big word's kind of lose me, and have to be explained in laymen's terms. When they start to talk a lot of medical terms I will never understand, they have to explain it over until I get it.
In a few sentences, please explain the reasons why you trust or distrust your primary care physician. If you do not have a primary care physician, please answer in regard to doctors in general.

Doctor now a days don't act concern I at all  always in s hurry and don't listen my doctor prescribed me meds and my other doctor asked why was I taking two meds that shouldn't go together. I was so mad.
Do you feel anxiety when you meet doctors? In a few sentences, please describe what makes you feel most anxious or worried when visiting the doctor's office.
Not knowing if I'm going to get the proper care or treatment, and by me not having a good insurance provider you have to deal with it.
Please In a few sentences, please describe an experience in your life that demonstrated your knowledge of health or medical issues.
Becoming a victim of COPD and also arthritis in my shoulders back and hips and knees from years of doing CNA work

To what degree do you feel you have the capacity to obtain, process, and understand basic health information and services needed to make appropriate health decisions? Please explain your answer in a few sentences.

I know I have the capacity to understand and retain most information fed to me by doctors and nurses.  I do ask the questions I need to ask but sometimes they don't have the time to answer them.  If I need more answers, I go look up the questions I have and write down items for my next visit.
In a few sentences, please explain the reasons why you trust or distrust your primary care physician. If you do not have a primary care physician, please answer in regard to doctors in general.

I trust my doctor to give me the medical knowledge I need to mage my life the correct way.  I've never had a doctor who is so willing and able to take the time to listen.  They block out time for each patient.
Do you feel anxiety when you meet doctors? In a few sentences, please describe what makes you feel most anxious or worried when visiting the doctor's office.
I never know what to expect.  It's good that i go but it's extremely stressful knowing they could find something drastically wrong.  There is nothing I like about it.
Please In a few sentences, please describe an experience in your life that demonstrated your knowledge of health or medical issues.

My wife has MS and I go with her to every appointment.  The doctor was impressed that I knew so much about the disease and that we were already doing some of the exercises.  She gave us some more things to try to help with mobility.  This disease has a lot of twists and turns.  Everyday is something new to learn about.

Yes I feel like I understand everything by asking questions and making sure I read all my paperwork fully..sometimes I Google to make sure everything is legit
In a few sentences, please explain the reasons why you trust or distrust your primary care physician. If you do not have a primary care physician, please answer in regard to doctors in general.
I don't have a primary doctor right now but all the doctors I be been too turned out good whatever they recommended worked
Do you feel anxiety when you meet doctors? In a few sentences, please describe what makes you feel most anxious or worried when visiting the doctor's office.
The thing that makes me worried is if the doctor will find something wrong with me that I was not aware of..the unknown
Please In a few sentences, please describe an experience in your life that demonstrated your knowledge of health or medical issues.
Once I had strep throat and I knew because of my symptoms and I used Google to compare and I went to the doctor without saying anything and they diagnosed me with it

To what degree do you feel you have the capacity to obtain, process, and understand basic health information and services needed to make appropriate health decisions? Please explain your answer in a few sentences.

I feel that I have a pretty good ability and capacity for these things. I can understand most of it and if I don't I can find someone who can. Sometimes it is a bit hard to find someone but I make sure that I do.
In a few sentences, please explain the reasons why you trust or distrust your primary care physician. If you do not have a primary care physician, please answer in regard to doctors in general.
The doctor that I have now is pretty good. He seems honest and decent. So I do trust him a good bit. Don't feel this way about all doctors but this one is pretty good.
Do you feel anxiety when you meet doctors? In a few sentences, please describe what makes you feel most anxious or worried when visiting the doctor's office.
I guess just worrying that something will turn up. That the doctor will find something that is very bad. I would say that is mostly what I worry about.
Please In a few sentences, please describe an experience in your life that demonstrated your knowledge of health or medical issues.

When I had to talk to my mom about a rare lung disease she has. She doesn't know much about it and wasn't sure that she was getting the right treatment. I had to research it more, which I could do because I could understand what I was reading.
